name: Trellus Health, Inc.
description: Trellus Health, Inc. is a healthcare technology company dedicated to transforming the management of chronic conditions, particularly inflammatory bowel disease (IBD). Founded in 2020, Trellus Health leverages proprietary technology and personalized care protocols to provide patients with the tools they need to manage their health effectively. The company's platform combines digital solutions with clinical support to promote better health outcomes and enhance the patient experience. By focusing on a holistic approach, Trellus Health empowers patients to take control of their disease management, improving adherence to treatment plans and reducing hospitalizations. The company is committed to advancing IBD care through innovation, research, and collaboration with healthcare providers. Trellus Health's mission is to deliver tailored support that addresses the unique challenges faced by individuals with chronic conditions, ultimately aiming to improve quality of life and health outcomes across diverse patient populations.
